definition: to drip, or shed by trickling
kjvTranslation: distil, drop, flood, (cause to) flow(-ing), gush out, melt, pour (down), running water, stream.

translations.bg: да капе или да се излива чрез стичане
translations.da: at dryppe eller udgyde ved at risle
translations.el: να στάζει, ή να χύνεται με το σταγονόμετρο
translations.id: menetes, atau ditumpahkan dengan cara menetes
translations.it: gocciolare, o spargere per mezzo di un rivolo
translations.nb: å dryppe, eller utgyte ved å sildre
translations.ro: a picura sau a se vărsa prin scurgere
translations.sv: att droppa, eller avge genom att sippra
